price: Dan apakah mereka tidak memperhatikan bagaimana Allah memulai penciptaan (makhluk), kemudian Dia mengulanginya (kembali). Sungguh, yang demikian itu mudah bagi Allah.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw kayfa yub'di-u al-lahu al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu inna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
